item.title: Starting the Programmer's Alliance at the University of Central Missouri: A Journey in the Making - Part 1
item.description: Starting the Programmer’s Alliance at the University of Central Missouri: A Journey in the Making - Part 1 Link to heading As a student of computer science at the University of Central Missouri, I was always searching for ways to dive deeper into the field and improve my skills. During a class discussion about the Association for Computing Machinery workshop on cloud computing, I brought up the idea of starting a programming club with my professor.
